name: Unown M
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Metal]
abilities.effect: Whenever a {M} Pokémon damages 1 of your Pokémon, reduce that damage by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). This power stops working if you have more than 1 Unown M in play. (This power works even if Unown M is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.)

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
